Items.Title: A Local Law to authorize the extension of deadlines for the filing of applications and renewal applications for real property tax abatement and exemption programs.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorize the extension of deadlines for the filing of applications and renewal applications for real property tax abatement and exemption programs.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.8921, which relates to postponing the New York City 2020 tax lien sale until one year after the COVID-19 state of emergency has been lifted.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Postponing the NYC 2020 tax lien sale until one year after the COVID-19 state of emergency has been lifted. (S.8921)

Items.Title: A Local Law to authorize the extension of deadlines for the filing of applications and renewal applications for real property tax abatement and exemption programs.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorize the extension of deadlines for the filing of applications and renewal applications for real property tax abatement and exemption programs.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.8921, which relates to postponing the New York City 2020 tax lien sale until one year after the COVID-19 state of emergency has been lifted.

Items.MatterName: Postponing the NYC 2020 tax lien sale until one year after the COVID-19 state of emergency has been lifted. (S.8921)
